author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

- Removed headers and put declaration in .cc files
- Removed use of module.cc file
- Pulled out parameters in constructor
- Wrote fillDescriptions
- Used edm::ESGetToken
- Made KFSwitching1DUpdator not depend on ParameterSet

#### PR validation:

The code compiles. This is a refactoring and should not change any results.
title: Modernized ESProducers in TrackingTools/KalmanUpdators
